meanings.definition: Lack of sensitivity or consideration for others.
meanings.sent1: Her insensitivenesses towards her friend's feelings hurt their relationship.
meanings.sent2: The insensitivenesses of the manager made the employees feel unappreciated.
meanings.sent3: His insensitivenesses to his sister's jokes always led to awkward moments.
meanings.sent4: The insensitivenesses of the politician towards the community's needs was glaring.
meanings.sent5: The insensitivenesses of the teacher towards the students' struggles was concerning.

meanings.definition: The state of being insensitive or unfeeling.
meanings.sent1: The insensitivenesses of the villain made him a heartless character in the story.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the insensitivenesses of her classmate towards the animals.
meanings.sent3: The insensitivenesses of the robot's actions provided comic relief in the movie.
meanings.sent4: The insensitivenesses of the storm towards the fragile flowers was devastating.
meanings.sent5: The insensitivenesses of the rock towards the chisel's strikes was evident in the sculpture.
